title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 161.8 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 161.8 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations
(a) Denial of a request for records or
amendment or correction of a record or personal information: (1)
shall be in writing, explaining the
reasons therefor; and
(2)
identify
the person to whom an appeal may be directed. (b) A failure to grant or deny access to
records within five business days of the receipt of a request or within 30 days
of an acknowledgment or the receipt of a refusal, or a failure to respond to a
request for amendment or correction of a record within 30 business days of
receipt of such a request, shall be construed as a denial that may be
appealed. (c) Any such denial may
be appealed to: Administrative Appeals Board, Department of Motor Vehicles, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12228. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
161.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
